long_desc.thetext: I'm suggesting a qooxdoo "Powered by" icon that app builders can include in their apps and websites, and which can carry a link to the qooxdoo web site.

Created attachment 119 Icon prototype
This is just a rough prototype, to give an idea.

Created attachment 120 Small "powered by qooxdoo" icon "stolen" from qooxdoo.org
"Inspired" from Thomas work ;-)

Created attachment 121 Small "powered by qooxdoo" icon "stolen" from qooxdoo.org
"Inspired" from Thomas work ;-)

Created attachment 122 "powered by qooxdoo" icon "stolen" from qooxdoo.org
"Inspired" from Thomas work ;-)

Created attachment 123 "powered by qooxdoo" icon "stolen" from qooxdoo.org
"Inspired" from Thomas work ;-)

(In reply to comment #5) > Created an attachment (id=123) [details] > "powered by qooxdoo" icon "stolen" from qooxdoo.org > > "Inspired" from Thomas work ;-) >
Excellent, Dietrich! This is beautiful and production quality (much more than my crude draft). I love it :-).

(In reply to comment #6) > (In reply to comment #5) > > Created an attachment (id=123) [details] [details] > > "powered by qooxdoo" icon "stolen" from qooxdoo.org > > > > "Inspired" from Thomas work ;-) > > > > Excellent, Dietrich! This is beautiful and production quality (much more than > my crude draft). I love it :-). >
If someone of the original logo designers can provide their original work (Photoshop et. al.) I'll be able to create a darkblue on white version in a smaller size like the sourceforge logo at the bottom of this page.

There is a new media download page at: http://qooxdoo.org/about/media_download
You can use the original Adobe Illustrator image (vector based) to produce new images.
I like your first graphics. I would like if the "Powered by" is somewhat smaller and clearer and without a glow effect. More styled like the sub-title on the homepage.
A slight button effect would be cool, too (with rounded borders etc.)
Maybe we should start a contest to create the best set of qooxdoo style buttons :)
Created attachment 124 Button like without glow effect (codename Sebastian) ;-)
Created attachment 125 Button like without glow effect with darkblue/black fg and white bg (codename Sebastian) ;-)
